name: Treb-wordpress
tagline: Automated python script to pull agent and public listing data from the Toronto Real Estate Board
body:
TREB Wordpress Python Integration
=================================

[Managed Hosting Services](http://www.stardothosting.com/managed-dedicated-servers/)

[Toronto Web Design](http://www.shift8web.com)


Easily integrate your Toronto Real Estate Board listings into your wordpress blog with this Python script.

This script utilizes many 3rd party libraries, most importantly the wordpress_xmlrpc library available here :

https://github.com/maxcutler/python-wordpress-xmlrpc


More Information
================

You can read the full installation and implementation instructions here : 

http://www.shift8web.com/blog/treb-wordpress-python-integration
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
